title: Calories in Babybel Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in Babybel cheese per piece, including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick variations for better tracking.
assumptions: Original semi-soft Babybel cheese wheel, 20g per piece, pasteurized processed cheese.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and exact size; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Babybel cheese provides ~70 kcal and ~5 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Babybel cheese?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal for one original 20g piece.

faqs.q: Is Babybel cheese high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, one piece has 5 g protein, making it a good snack option.

faqs.q: What about carbs in Babybel cheese?
faqs.a: Zero carbs, fiber, and sugars per pieceâ€”keto-friendly.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Babybel cheese?
faqs.a: Around 170 mg per piece, so moderate for daily intake.

faqs.q: Does Babybel cheese have trans fats?
faqs.a: No trans fats; total fat is 6 g with 4 g saturated per piece.
